name: Sidestep Legends
description:
Vampire Survivors meets League of Legends in this moba inspired action rogue lite.

Sidestep or use your abilities to dodge the storm of abilities thrown at you


Or suffer the consequences if you get hit


Kill the minions before they become too many to handle


And watch out for the boss


Features:
  • Quick 20 minutes rounds
  • Growing roster of characters to unlock each with its own stats and unique trait
  • Large pool of active abilities and passive upgrades to choose from during gameplay
  • Permanent upgrades that makes you stronger after each run

If you like more active horde survival games like Soulstone Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn I think you will enjoy this as well.
